summary: HeroSection.tsx was updated to use a different background image path (/assets/generated/anime-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png) and no longer references the current moon-waterfall-volcano-sun image. However, the diff does not show the previously-used background asset being restored/added under frontend/public/assets (or /generated), so asset-restoration/static-serving requirements are not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: If the previously-used hero background image file is not present in the repository under frontend/public/assets (or frontend/public/assets/generated), restore it (re-add the prior asset) and ensure it is served as a static frontend asset.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added/restored asset file under frontend/public/assets or frontend/public/assets/generated; only a code reference change in HeroSection.tsx and updates to summary/state files are shown.
